thread.title: Once more unto the breach with Jamie in the battle of sugar hill
thread.title_full: Once more unto the breach with Jamie in the battle of sugar hill

title: Once more unto the breach with Jamie in the battle of sugar hill
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Once more unto the breach with Jamie in the battle of sugar hill Jamie Oliver pepped up the health select committee hearing with a picnic basket of sugar-laden props Press Association Google+ 1 of 1 Jamie Oliver pepped up the health select committee hearing with a picnic basket of sugar-laden props Press Association Jamie Oliver   witness. For a start, he answered all the health committee’s questions with honesty, frankness and cockney chirpiness. He had also brought a picnic with him. 
“I’m a chef, a campaigner, an author and, most importantly today, a dad,” Oliver said, when asked to identify himself at the outset of a hearing into childhood obesity. “Frankly,” he said, “we need to act like a parent.” 
Oliver wanted the government’s permission to put Pepsi-Cola, Haribo, Red Bull and Curly-Wurly on the Subscribe now
